name: ArrowNockEvent
description: ArrowNockEvent is fired when a player begins using a bow. This event is fired whenever a player begins using a bow in ItemBow#onItemRightClick(ItemStack, World, EntityPlayer). result contains the resulting ItemStack due to the use of the bow. This event is Cancelable . If this event is canceled, the player does not begin using the bow. This event does not have a result. HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS .
